body_html:
Philosophically speaking, I'd prefer for the configure script not to run any bazel commands (esp fetch, since that does a lot of work). It would be more "normal" to write some config files and have the build step clean/fetch if it detects a config change.

But.. if this is really complicated, I dont feel very strongly, just figured I'd voice my opinion.
